about_the_game:
"Lovely and Brave maid-warriors save the Earth from evils"

Little Angels is an arena shooter survival game with minimalistic gameplay and roguelite elements in which maid-warriors with various characteristics-a clumsy princess, a genius scientist, a special force-, defeat invading enemies and powerful bosses.
Maid-warriors must survive from waves of enemies and create your own builds by choosing from a variety of weapons and items to defeat the powerful boss at the end of the stage to save peace on Earth.


Variety of Maid-warriors




A clumsy princess, a genius scientist, a special force… there are various lovely maid-warriors with distinct characteristics, and you will meet more of maid-warriors through gameplay and updates.


A shop sales over 100+ weapons and items



Create a new build for with random choices from the shop between waves of enemies.
There are no definite walkthroughs. With your own Style or Goal, sweep the enemies in a variety of ways.


Easy operation, Increasingly stronger enemies and boss




Simple controls such as auto-firing weapons and a few buttons for movements and skill uses, You can easily and quickly adapt and get into yourself in the game.
But, as the waves progress, the enemies gradually increase in number and strength, so you should never let your guard down.
And at the end of the stage, a powerful boss awaits you. Find out the patterns and attack to defeat the boss and bring peace to the stage.


Synopsis




From ancient times, it has always been the maid's mission to protect world peace from beings threatening humanity.
As the difficult struggle continues against the increasingly powerful enemies, a new maid-warrior 'Otohime' arrives at the maid bar 'Little Angels', and important base for maid-warriors.
However, without even having time to say hello to the crew, she is immediately thrust into battle against the imminent emergency situation facing Little Angels, posed by the encrooaching enemies…
